LanguageData.Apparel_TribalA.label: tribalwear
LanguageData.Apparel_TribalA.description: A full-body garment crafted using neolithic tools. While it may look primitive, it is effective at insulating the wearer.
LanguageData.Apparel_Parka.label: parka
LanguageData.Apparel_Parka.description: A parka for staying warm in even the coldest of temperatures.
LanguageData.Apparel_Pants.label: bukser
LanguageData.Apparel_BasicShirt.label: T-shirt
LanguageData.Apparel_CollarShirt.label: knap skjorte
LanguageData.Apparel_CollarShirt.description: En flot skjorte med krave og knapper.
LanguageData.Apparel_Duster.label: lang frakke
LanguageData.Apparel_Duster.description: En lang frakke til at blokere solen og grit of the outdoors.
LanguageData.Apparel_Jacket.label: jakke
LanguageData.Apparel_Jacket.description: En slidstærk jakke til at forhindre skrammer og blå mærker, og som holder en varm i køligt vejr.
LanguageData.Apparel_PlateArmor.label: plate armor
LanguageData.Apparel_PlateArmor.description: Overlapping solid plates of armor covering the entire body from neck to feet.
LanguageData.Apparel_FlakVest.label: flakvest
LanguageData.Apparel_FlakVest.description: En vest med panserplader i ryggen og brystet. Selvom den er ret effektiv til at afbøje skud og knivangreb mod brystet, gør den ikke noget for at beskytte lemmerne.
LanguageData.Apparel_FlakPants.label: flakbukser
LanguageData.Apparel_FlakPants.description: Et par bukser med indsyet panserpladser. While it's not as good as solid armor, it offers effective protection against all manner of attacks while remaining quite comfortable.
LanguageData.Apparel_FlakJacket.label: flakjakke
LanguageData.Apparel_FlakJacket.description: En slidstærk stofjakke med indsyet panserplader. While it's not as good as solid armor, it offers effective protection against all manner of attacks while remaining quite comfortable.
LanguageData.Apparel_PowerArmor.label: power armor
LanguageData.Apparel_PowerArmor.description: A suit of powered armor. Layered plasteel-weave plates are very effective at stopping attacks. Neuro-memetic robotics allow a human to wear the heavy armor and still be capable of moving easily.\n\nPowered armor usually used by heavy infantry and space marines from spacer-tech militaries.
LanguageData.Apparel_PowerArmor.label: kraft rustning
LanguageData.Apparel_PowerArmor.description: Kraft rustninger er som regel brugt af angrebs tropperne fra en advanceret glitterverdens planet.
